solution: From $\triangle PQR$, we have $\angle R = 180^\circ - \angle Q - \angle P = 105^\circ$.  Since $\overline{ST}\parallel \overline{QR}$, we have $\angle STR = 180^\circ - \angle R = \boxed{75^\circ}$.
model_solution:
Since $\overline{ST}\parallel\overline{QR}$, $m\angle P+ m\angle Q = 75^\circ$.
Since $\overline{ST}\parallel\overline{QR}$, $m\angle STR + m\angle Q + m\angle P= 180^\circ$.
steps: Since $\overline{ST}\parallel\overline{QR}$, $m\angle STR + m\angle Q + m\angle P= 180^\circ$.
full_steps: Since $\overline{ST}\parallel\overline{QR}$, $m\angle STR + m\angle Q + m\angle P= 180^\circ$.
